== Kolacherry (CT) (627215) ==

Kolacherry (CT) is a town in the [[Taliparamba]] taluka of [[Kannur]] district with an area of 10.89 sq. km. and harbouring 3307 households with total population of 17095 as per the 2011 Census. The district headquarter [[Kannur]] is at a distance of 16 km. The state headquarter [[Thiruvananthapuram]] is at a distance of 530 km. Male population is 7847 and female population is 9248. Scheduled Caste population is 922 and Scheduled Tribes population is 30. Census Location Code of the town is 627215<ref>http://www.censusindia.gov.in/2011census/dchb/DCHB.html</ref>.

Population wise class of the town is Class IV (population_total 10,000 to 19,999).
The civic status of the town is 'Census Town'.

The nearest city with population more than 1 lakh is Kanhangad  (m + og) at a distance of 96 km. The nearest city with population more than 5 lakh is Kozhikode (m corp. + og) at a distance of 120 km. Railway station is at Kannur at a distance of 16 km.
